resources.string: I received a report that there was an issue with the Tomcat session in a project I worked on previously.\nUpon investigation, I found that UDP could not be used, and when I contacted the network administrator, I was told that UDP was blocked due to internal policies.\nI modified the Cluster element in config/server.xml as follows.

Since this was a change to the multicast configuration I had done previously, it worked immediately after restarting Tomcat. However, one thing to note is that you need to add the distributable element in the web.xml inside the WEB-INF directory as follows.
